FINAL REPORT ON STATUS OF AGRICULTURE IN KHAGARIA AND SAHARSA (BIHAR)_JULY 27_2017
Note 2:
PRADAN is a relatively new entrant in the districts of Khagaria and Saharsa. Hence one of the main
objectives of the survey was to understand the state of agriculture in these two districts. Reliable
information on these aspects is expected to help PRADAN formulate appropriate strategies for
interventions leading to increased income, security and nutrition for the rural households in these
districts.
